participant_1.background:
I plan to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
i have male pattern baldness.
i don t like waking up early.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.

participant_2.background:
I'm not that close to my family, but I do try to keep in touch.
i like to bowl.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

content.text: I plan to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
I hope you do! Reading is such a great way to pass the time and learn new things.
I know! I'm excited to have the time to really delve into some good books. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to bowl! I'm not very good, but I have a lot of fun. I also like to grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
That's cool! I've never been bowling before, but I've always wanted to try it. Potatoes are delicious! What's your favorite way to cook them?
My favorite way to cook potatoes is to roast them in the oven. I like to add a little bit of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that sometime.
You should! It's a great way to enjoy potatoes.
I'm sure Buddy would like that too!
He loves potatoes! He's always begging for them when I'm cooking them.
That's so cute! I love dogs.
I'm glad we agree on something!
